TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_sminuw, title = sminuw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/sminuw} }

S.FORM: ktan maku qu byacing cyux babaw kyal ga, sminuw saku iyal, llungu maku balay qu yaba ru yaya mu.
ktan mako qo byacing cyox babaw kyal ga, sminow sako iyal, llongo mako balay qo yaba ro yaya mo.
